resources.string: Level One\nTake on the worse half baked game ever. This is the first level and only level where nothing really happens.
Level Two\nSame level as the first level. It\'s amazing how much time it takes to make just one level.
Level One\nThere aren\'t actually any water levels, this is the same level as the first level in the land types.
Level Two\nNot to repeat myself but this is the same level as the first level in the land types.
